channel.title: Databases on Desh Raj
channel.description: Recent content in Databases on Desh Raj

item.title: Survey on Probabilistic Databases
item.description: In this project, we reviewed existing work on probabilistic databases, categorized into 5 major sections, namely algebra, query evaluation, conditioning, scaling and implementation. Through a reevaluation of performance parameters, we showed that query evaluation is indeed the bottleneck in efficient development and implementation of the probabilistic DBMS model. Report Slides
